api_list.name: Combine
api_list.description:
Combine multiple PDF files to one PDF file

*files* - Required  PDF files
*combinedFileName* - Optional name that will be used for the file. Generic name if is not defined

api_list.name: Image
api_list.description:
Split one PDF document to multiple image files:

*file* - Original PDF file
*type* - Extension of image to return
*dpi* - DPI of images

api_list.name: Split
api_list.description:
Split one PDF document to multiple PDF documents

*file* - Required File. Original PDF file
